name: example
synopsis: Output provided parameters to the console
description:
Modelled after the unix command 'echo', this example command can be utilized to out text to the console.

Additionally, the example command is a template and demonstration for how to create a new khepri black command line project.

options.synopsis: Show this help message and exit.
